text:
@SenSchumer New York Governor Cuomo sent COVID19 patients into nursing homes
Mayor of New York is advocating for the rounding up and arresting of Jews practicing their constitutional rights.
New York Democrat  threatens to shut down churches & synagogues permanently.

What could go wrong?
